Summary: I have HD video of some thing very similar to the 2094 Tinley Park Il video
divs: sighting detailswhile video taping fireworks on my hd camera i saw reoccurring red dots that seemed to be flying in formation, not fading out like fireworks. i'm certain they are not fireworks! there must have been 50 plus red and white dots moving west to north east that kept coming and coming. i was reminded by this event when i saw the tribune on sat. that mentioned the tpark sightings. my wife and i had a baby in march so with being so occupied i forgot to report anything. i am willing to show you the video- i like in frankfort. unless the airport has record of a flying club flying 50+ small silent planes, this has got to be ufo's. it's also worth noting that there was no sound at all. this is no hoax, give me a call. i have hi 8 hd video and i don't know how to upload it. call me on my cell. *(wit's telephone number deleted--cms\sg).
